results.title: Rosuvastatin and simvastatin attenuate cisplatin-induced cardiotoxicity via disruption of endoplasmic reticulum stress-mediated apoptotic death in rats: targeting ER-Chaperone GRP78 and Calpain-1 pathways
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@RSV@@@ (10 mg/ kg/day) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ (10 mg/kg/day) were orally administered for 15 days.

citations.NLM: Saleh DO, Mansour DF, Mostafa RE. Rosuvastatin and simvastatin attenuate cisplatin-induced cardiotoxicity via disruption of endoplasmic reticulum stress-mediated apoptotic death in rats: targeting ER-Chaperone GRP78 and Calpain-1 pathways Toxicol Rep. 2020;7():1178-1186. PMID: 32995293

results.title: Simvastatin prevents angiotensin II-induced cardiac alteration and oxidative stress.
results.text_hl: The influence of the @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_25675 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was assessed on the @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018376 @@@cardiovascular alterations@@@ and production of @CHEMICAL_Free_Radicals @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005609 @@@free radicals@@@ associated with chronic @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@ (@GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@Ang II@@@) infusion.

citations.NLM: Delbosc S, Cristol JP, Descomps B, Mimran A, Jover B. Simvastatin prevents angiotensin II-induced cardiac alteration and oxidative stress. Hypertension. 2002 Aug;40(2):142-7. PMID: 12154104

results.title: Simvastatin reverses target organ damage and oxidative stress in Angiotensin II hypertension: comparison with apocynin, tempol, and hydralazine.
results.text_hl: The ability of the @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_25675 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to reverse established @<m>DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018376 @@@cardiovascular and renal alterations@@@ and oxidative stress was assessed in @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@ (@GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@AngII@@@) @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Rugale C, Delbosc S, Mimran A, Jover B. Simvastatin reverses target organ damage and oxidative stress in Angiotensin II hypertension: comparison with apocynin, tempol, and hydralazine. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2007 Sep;50(3):293-8. PMID: 17878758

results.title: [Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome--case report, diagnostics and therapeutic options].
results.text_hl: After the diagnosis had been confirmed, a therapeutic approach with oral substitution of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ and the administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was initiated.

citations.NLM: Oberthür A, Heller R, Vogel M, Körber F, Rahimi G, Hoopmann M, Emmel M, Roth B, Vierzig A. [Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome--case report, diagnostics and therapeutic options]. Z Geburtshilfe Neonatol. 2009 Oct;213(5):210-4. PMID: 19856245
